title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 285.5 - Subpoenas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 285.5 - Subpoenas

State Regulations
(a) Subpoenas shall
specify the names of the witnesses and the documents called for with such
particularity as will enable identification for purposes of
production. (b) Subpoenas issued by
a board of inquiry shall be signed by the chairman thereof and shall bear the
seal of the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
285.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
